items: Flamtaer hammer (or 13,000 coins to buy it at the general store) to build faster
req.name: Recommended

1.step: Search the shelf for a diary and open the book.
1.subtitle: Getting started

description: Search the shelf for a diary and open the book.

2.step: Use ashes on Tarromin potion (unf) to make Serum 207.
2.subtitle: A Temporary Cure (Serum 207)

description: Use ashes on Tarromin potion
Use Serum 207 on Razmire (afflicted).

4.step: Kill five loar shades and pick-up their remains.

description: Kill five loar shades.
Pick-up loar remains.
Use Serum 207 on Razmire(afflicted) if got infected again.

6.step: Right-click and open his general store to buy Olive oil.

description: Right-click and open his general store to buy Olive oil.

7.step: Right-click and open his builders store to buy 5 timber beams, 5 limestone bricks, 25 swamp paste.

description: Right-click and open his builders store to buy 5 timber beams, 5 limestone bricks, 25 swamp paste.

8.step: Use the Serum 207 on Ulsquire Shauncy.

description: Use the serum on Ulsquire Shauncy.
Talk to Ulsquire Shauncy again.

10.step: Repair the temple until you reach 100% repair and at least 10 sanctity. (Use World 77 for the official mini-game world)
10.subtitle: Repairing the temple

description: Go to world 77 and repair the temple until you reach 100% repair and at least 10 sanctity.

11.step: Light the sacred altar in the centre of the temple.

description: Light the sacred altar in the centre of the temple. Or wait for another player to light the altar.

12.step: Use your olive oil on the flame to make sacred oil.

description: Use your olive oil on the flame to make sacred oil.

13.step: (Optional) Use Serum 207 on the flame to make Serum 208, which permanently cures NPCs.

description: Use Serum 207 on the flame to make Serum 208, which permanently cures NPCs.
Use Serum 208 on Razmire (afflicted) to permanently cure him.
Use Serum 208 on Ulsquire (afflicted) to permanently cure him.

14.step: Use a sacred oil on a log.
14.subtitle: Burning a shade

description: Use a sacred oil on a log.

15.step: Use the pyre log on the funeral pyre.

description: Use the pyre log on the funeral pyre.

16.step: Use the Loar remains on the funeral pyre.

description: Use the Loar remains on the funeral pyre.
Light the funeral pyre with a tinderbox in inventory.
Pick-up the reward.
Talk to Ulsquire Shauncy.
